Quickstrike:




Quickstrike watched Mantella briefly out of curiousity. He looked back to 
the face of the table in front of him. "Ah jus' need to get a few things 
b'fore ah's get settled down and wait fer that stasis pod to come," he said 
thinking aloud. "Two maybe." He opened up his comm-link to Megatron. "Boss, 
ah need t' talk t' ya when ya get th' chance in private. Over comm-link if 
ya want." He closed it down for a reply soon.
